game.name: Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate
game.shortDescription: Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life, but she decides enough is enough... She wants to change! And everything indeed changes when a spirit visits her and installs a strange app on her phone! The clock's ticking now... There are 90 days left!
